div.div: The Mission of the Flat Rock Community Schools is to provide quality educational programs, resources and the collaboration of support services for all community members, enabling them to be competent, informed and involved citizens in an ever-changing society.

OK2SAY is a nationally recognized program designed to enhance school safety by giving students the tools to step up and speak out when they are concerned about their safety or the safety of another. The department also offers free OK2SAY programming for parents, guardians, and community leaders.
Thank you for visiting our new website! Please check back often as updates are made, and click on article headlines to view full stories where applicable.

h3.a: 2019 Academic All-Stars: Flat Rock Community High School

div.strong: FLAT ROCK COMMUNITY SCHOOLS - WE ARE LEADERS IN LEARNING!

div.div: Your child's future begins at Flat Rock Community Schools. We offer exceptional opportunities and all of our students are encouraged to reach their full potential through quality education that is delivered by highly qualified teachers. Our AdvancED accredited school district can offer the following opportunities to your child:

Young 5's Program
Innovative Academics
21st Century Learning Environment
Comprehensive Athletics and Extracurricular Opportunities
Flat Rock Academic Virtual Academy
